data.actual_result: Discord crashes and when you reopen it you are in the server you tapped
data.expected_result: It should take you to the server and Discord should crashn't
data.short_description: Discord crashes when jumping to a server that you searched using the * filter in Quick Switcher
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Quick Switcher - Input the * character in the searchbar, or tap Filters > Servers  - Tap on any server
